response.explain: The previous action code failed because the robot was not within two meters of the fridge. The robot needs to move closer to the fridge before it can open it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
(3) Take the duck out of the fridge
(4) Cook the duck
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):

    donothing(env)
